title: NCLAT upholds insolvency proceedings against Tulip Hotels over default of guarantees
description: The National Company Law Appellate Tribunal (NCLAT) upheld insolvency proceedings against Tulip Hotels for defaulting on Rs 450 crore corporate guarantees given for Cox & Kings and EzeeGo One Travel & Tours. Yes Bank initiated the process over a plea for Rs 900 crore default.
